topics.body:
"@Ore-O":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53700a2963687276bfc20300#post_53700a2963687276bfc20300
[bq="Ore-O"]"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/537008ac636872190c230200#post_537008ac636872190c230200
*Suddenly you see an alternate version of you*
Dojyaaa~~n![/bq]
That would probably be awesome, but chances are that would end badly for me.
"Cheesy movie high five?"
"Cheesy movie high five"
(slowmo cheesy movie high five)
". . are we flying?"
"No, I think we're stuck"
"How are we supposed to eat?  What if we get hungry?  I feel kind of hungry"
"Calm down; we just need to think calmly about this"
"I can't take it anymore"
"Where did you get the gun?"
"For situations as desperate as this"
"Just calm down, just put it away"
(pop)
"Aggghhhh"
"And now to end it"
(gets unstuck and falls to the ground)
"I'm unstuck? I'M UNSTUCK!"
(Jumps in excitement and gets stuck again)
". . fuck"
